org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Error-IncompleteViralLoadData
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Viral Loads without DateReported or DateOrdered
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select obs.person_id, pid1.identifier as PepfarID, pid2.identifier as HospID, person.gender as Sex, person.birthdate as DOB, encounter.encounter_datetime as VisitDate, form.name as PMMForm, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164989,obs.value_datetime, null)) as DateOrdered, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159951,obs.value_datetime, null)) as DateSampleCollected, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165414,obs.value_datetime, null)) as DateReported, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164980,cn1.name, null)) as IndicationForViralLoadTest, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=856,obs.value_numeric, null)) as ViralLoad from obs left join patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) left join patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid2.identifier_type=5 and pid2.voided=0) INNER join encounter on(encounter.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and encounter.voided=0 and encounter.form_id=21) left join person on(obs.person_id=person.person_id and obs.voided=0 and person.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) left join form on(form.form_id=encounter.form_id) WHERE encounter.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate and encounter.voided=0 GROUP BY encounter.patient_id,encounter.encounter_id HAVING MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=856,obs.value_numeric, null)) IS NOT NULL AND ( MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=164989,obs.value_datetime, null)) IS NULL OR MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165414,obs.value_datetime, null)) IS NULL );
